text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GL Series GL63 9SDK-610 15.6" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the MSI GL Series GL63 9SDK-610 15.6" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the MSI GL Series GL63 9SDK-610 15.6" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Fortnite. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch.
